comments.author: Julian
comments.body: I'll have you know that I set off at a very relaxed pace! It wasn't until I was in the canyon that a number of Louisville Cyclery riders threw down the challenge and I started to foam at the mouth. A good ride despite the wind which always seemed to be in my face....go figure. JK

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: We're just razzin' ya, Julian! We saw you pedaling easy on the way out 36 while some punk was trying to grab your wheel. He was working hard...little did he know.
